name: Amlan Ganguly
content: Amlan's Home RIT Department of Computer Engineering Amlan Ganguly Department Head and Professor Department of Computer Engineering Room: 09-3425 Rochester Institute of Technology Rochester, New York 14623-5603 Phone: 585-475-4082 Email: amlan.ganguly@rit.edu Skype: amlan.ganguly@skype.com Web: http://people.rit.edu/axgeec Home Research Publications Teaching Biography People News: 1.Â CONGRATULATIONS to Purab Ranjan Sutradhar on becoming tenure-track Assistant Professor in Boise State University, fall 2024. URL: https://www.boisestate.edu/coen-ece/directory/sutradhar/ Student Resources: Students who want to join my research group are encouraged to contact me via email or in my office at the earliest. Funding opportunities at PhD, MS, BSMS and BS levels is possible depending on merit and availability. Last updated: 11/08/2024
